item.title: How to Manage Cities in Microsoft Windows World Clock (Windows 11)
item.description: This tutorial covers: How to Add a City: With Click With Keyboard Shortcut With Keyboard How to Clear the “Add New Location” Window: With Click With Backspace With Delete How to Exit the “Add New Location” Window How to Delete a City: With Click With Right Click With Keyboard Shortcut No time to scroll down? Click through this tutorial presentation: See a tutorial video: How to Add a City With Click Step 1: First switch to the World Clock mode.
